oai_dc:dc.dc:title: St James Hotel along the river
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of a town along the bluffs, as seen from the river. St James Hotel can be seen in the photograph, as well as other surrounding buildings. Location unidentified, though it could possibly be Red Wing, Minnesota, which sits along the Mississippi River.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Earl S. Miers River Photograph Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hotels; Waterfronts
